achievements.description: You earned 70 Gold Medals in Story missions.
achievements.howTo: Earn 70 Gold Medals in Story missions.

achievements.description: You completed a Companion Activity in each camp.

achievements.description: You played all mini games.
achievements.howTo: Play all mini games.

achievements.name: Breaking and Entering
achievements.description: You recovered the stash from 4 homesteads.
achievements.howTo: Recover the stash from 4 homesteads.

achievements.name: Artificial Intelligence
achievements.description: You discovered the fate of Marko Dragic.
achievements.howTo: Discover the fate of Marko Dragic.

achievements.name: Take From the Rich
achievements.description: You robbed or looted $250.
achievements.howTo: Rob or loot $250.

achievements.name: Give to the Poor
achievements.description: You donated $250 to the gang tithing box.
achievements.howTo: Donate $250 to the gang tithing box.

achievements.name: Pony Up
achievements.description: You spent $5000 across all shops.
achievements.howTo: Spend $5000 across all shops.

achievements.name: Extreme Personality
achievements.description: You reached maximum or minimum Honor level.
achievements.howTo: Reach maximum or minimum Honor level.

achievements.name: Western Stranger
achievements.description: You completed 10 Stranger mission strands.
achievements.howTo: Complete 10 Stranger mission strands.

achievements.name: Bountiful
achievements.description: You survived for 3 days holding a bounty of $250 in all states.
achievements.howTo: Survive 3 days holding a bounty of $250 in all states.

achievements.name: Collector's Item
achievements.description: You completed one of the Collectable strands.
achievements.howTo: Complete one of the Collectable strands.

achievements.name: Paying Respects
achievements.description: You found the graves of each of your fallen companions.
achievements.howTo: Find the graves of each of your fallen companions.

achievements.name: Errand Boy
achievements.description: You delivered 5 camp companion item requests.
achievements.howTo: Deliver 5 camp companion item requests.

achievements.name: It's Art
achievements.description: You found a permanent home for the squirrel statue.
achievements.howTo: Find a permanent home for the squirrel statue.

achievements.name: Self Sufficient
achievements.description: You crafted 30 unique items in Story Mode.
achievements.howTo: Craft 30 unique items in Story Mode.

achievements.name: Skin Deep
achievements.description: You skinned every species of animal in Story Mode.
achievements.howTo: Skin every species of animal in Story Mode.

achievements.name: Zoologist
achievements.description: You studied every animal across all states in Story Mode.
achievements.howTo: Study every animal across all states in Story Mode.

achievements.name: It was THIS Big!
achievements.description: You caught a fish weighing at least 16 lbs (7.3 kg).
achievements.howTo: Catch a fish weighing at least 16 lbs (7.3 kg).

achievements.name: Locked and Loaded
achievements.description: You upgraded each available component for a single sidearm or longarm weapon.
achievements.howTo: Upgrade each available component for a single sidearm or longarm weapon.

achievements.name: Grin and Bear it
achievements.description: You survived 18 bear attacks and killed the bear each time in Story Mode.
achievements.howTo: Survive 18 bear attacks and kill the bear each time in Story Mode.

achievements.name: Trusty Steed
achievements.description: You reached max bonding level with a horse.
achievements.howTo: Reach max bonding level with a horse.

achievements.howTo: Red Dead Online: Play 5 Free Roam Events.

achievements.howTo: Red Dead Online: Achieve 5 gold belt buckles from awards.

achievements.description: Red Dead Online: You achieved MVP 3 times (in a round with at least 4 players).
achievements.howTo: Red Dead Online: Achieve MVP 3 times (in a round with at least 4 players).

achievements.name: Horses for Courses
achievements.description: Red Dead Online: You concurrently owned 5 horses.

achievements.howTo: Red Dead Online: Reach Rank 50.

achievements.howTo: Red Dead Online: Craft 25 pieces of ammunition.

achievements.name: Posse Up

achievements.howTo: Red Dead Online: Form a Persistent Posse.

achievements.howTo: Red Dead Online: Craft 20 items (excluding ammo).

achievements.name: Butchered

achievements.howTo: Red Dead Online: Sell 20 items to the Butcher.

achievements.name: Picked to Perfection

achievements.howTo: Red Dead Online: Pick 25 Herbs.
